lom:description.lom:string: News article with engaging video. " Robotics program piques students' interest in science Cal Poly Pomona engineers help fifth- and sixth-graders build and program robots for sumo-style competitions. Educators say the hands-on program shows math's relevance and makes learning fun. The robotics program emphasizes problem-solving rather than work sheets."

lom:title.lom:string: Robotics program piques students' interest in science
